document_data.name: Scalespray
document_data.mainbody: '''''Scalespray''''' was a [[spell]] that could only be cast by [[dragon]]s.
document_data.Effects: This spell allowed a dragon to turn the loose items in their lair into a projectile to attack opponents with. When cast, objects within the lair such as bones, coins, gems and shed scales were hurled towards a target. Any creature within a {{SI|50|ft}} radius were vulnerable to being struck by the improvised missiles.
document_data.Casting: The spell required only a [[Verbal component|verbal]] component.
